description: Proudly Unemployable - Where host Michael O'Neal chats with other unemployable people like himself to learn how to take your skills and hobbies and turn them into a business. episodes.title: 529: Nick Unsworth on Transformation and Patience as a Solopreneur
episodes.description: We’ve all heard that patience is a virtue.  That’s especially true in the Solopreneur game.  We see people parading across the stage, or across our social media networks, and it’s hard to tell how long they’ve been working at it.  (HINT: It’s longer than you think) Today my pal Nick Unsworth (https://lifeonfire.com) stops by Studio […]

episodes.title: 521: Free Coaching Friday (Halfie).  Answering Your Solopreneur Questions
episodes.description: Hi all!  Welcome to another Free Coaching Friday…the day I answer your questions about business, life, and everything in between.  Today we talk Thailand, hypothetical sophie’s choice, managing your time as a solopreneur, good books to read about finances and productivity, my new drum purchase, and a lot more. Sorry about the coughing.
